ferminWeb.name: Fermin Guerrero's web
ferminWeb.description: Very happy to present Fermin Guerrero's personal web page, he is a type and graphic designer. This is a profesional project.

animationArtist.name: Perle Fine
animationArtist.description: This is a demo about animations. I choose Perle Fine because she was very talented.

todo.name: To-Do List
todo.description: This is the 10th project to refresh ReactJs concepts. I am writing an article about ReactJs main concepts so I can share it with the community once it's finished. This is a grocery app, you can add items to the list, remove and modify the name of the item. If you refresh the page, the items will still be there because I used Local Storage to store the items.

colorGenerator.name: Color Generator
colorGenerator.description: This is the 9th project to refresh ReactJs concepts. I am writing an article about ReactJs main concepts so I can share it with the community once it's finished. Get lightness or darkness of a color, if you write something that is not hex code, the input turn red. I used values.js to get the values.

paragrahp.name: Get Paragraph App
paragrahp.description: This is the 8th project to refresh ReactJs concepts. I am writing an article about ReactJs main concepts so I can share it with the community once it's finished. Get a number of paragraphs by choosing a number and clicking the button.

slider.name: Slider App
slider.description: This is the 7th project to refresh ReactJs concepts. I am writing an article about ReactJs main concepts so I can share it with the community once it's finished. This is a Slider app.

menu.name: Food Menu
menu.description: This is the 5th project to refresh ReactJs concepts. I am writing an article about ReactJs main concepts so I can share it with the community once it's finished. This is a menu app. You can choose the category and see what's in the menu.

accordion.name: Accordion
accordion.description: This is the 4th project to refresh ReactJs concepts. I am writing an article about ReactJs main concepts so I can share it with the community once it's finished. In this app you can read about Waitomo Caves (New Zeland), you can click the button to see more info.

reviews.name: Reviews
reviews.description: This is the 3rd project to refresh ReactJs concepts. I am writing an article about ReactJs main concepts so I can share it with the community once it's finished. Reviews app.

tours.name: Tours App
tours.description: This is the 2nd project to refresh ReactJs concepts. I am writing an article about ReactJs main concepts so I can share it with the community once it's finished. In this app you can delete the tours offers you are not interested in and refresh the list of tours.

birthday.name: Birthday app
birthday.description: This is the 1st project to refresh ReactJs concepts. I am writing an article about ReactJs main concepts so I can share it with the community once it's finished. It's a birthday app which reminds you of today's birthdays. You can clear the list once you checked.

portfolioSecond.name: Personal Portfolio Dev
portfolioSecond.description: This was my previous personal portfolio, with a minimalist and simple UI.

reduxCourse.name: Redux Course
reduxCourse.description: In this course I learnt about Functional Programming, how to implement Redux Toolkit, I did some testing with a library called "Jest" and Debugging with Redux Dev Tools and React Dev Tools. This is a very simple UI app where you can mark a Bug as resolved, I encourage you to have a look at the code please, the interesting part is in Store folder where you will find all the Redux code.

spotify.name: Spotify Clone
spotify.techStack: React Native + GraphQL + Typescript + AWS Amplify + AWS AppSync
spotify.description: In this opportunity, I built an Spotify clone with the same UI. Front End: React Native, Expo, TypeScript and React Navegation. Back End: AWS Amplify, AWS AppSync and GraphQL. I create my own database and fetch the data from there. I used the library Expo-av to play and stop the songs in real time.

crypto.name: CryptoTracker App
crypto.description: With this app you can check all the Crypto currencies available in the market, in which markets you can find them and also information about the specific one you selected. It will show you if the price went up or down in the last 24 hours and in USD as well! You can add your favourite curriencies and delete them as well.

recipe.name: Recipe App
recipe.description: This is a Recipe app built in ReactJs with Hooks, you can write the ingredient you like and you will get the recipes that contain that ingredient. Enjoy!

insta.name: Instagram Clone
insta.techStack: React Js + Styled Components + React Helmet (SEO) + GraphQl + React Apollo
insta.description: This is an Instagram clone for pets (because I love animals ðŸ’–), you can log in and log out (with authentification), like pictures, add to your favourites and delete.

todoredux.name: To-Do List Redux
todoredux.description: A To-Do list but this time with Redux!

twitter.name: Twitter Clone
twitter.description: Twitter Clon with login authentification with Github authentification in Firebase: To keep my Devitts (tweets), the devitts update in real time everytime I write one!. It will show the time was created and you can access to that Devitt if you want to. Firebase to keep the tweets and its info in a data base.

prevPort.name: Previous Personal Portfolio
prevPort.description: This is my first portfolio, is built in ReactJs. You can see the Figma design on github.

searchengine.name: Search engine, e-commerce
searchengine.description: This is a search engine where you can look for any product you like. I fetch the data from a public api from a large e-commerce from Argentina.

bali.name: Bali Experience
bali.description: This is a simple web with animated cards, just hover over the cards and you will see ðŸ™ˆ

weather.name: Weather App
weather.description: In this App you can type any city in the world and will tell you the weather. I fetch the data from a public Weather Api.

artist.name: Elizabeth's Web
artist.description: I built this web for an arstist. This is a profesional project.

parallax.name: La Muralla Roja Blog (The Red Wall Blog)
parallax.description: This is a simple web about a magical place in Spain, designed by architect Ricardo Bofill.
